tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE eco_materials_inventory (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_category VARCHAR(100),
    material_description TEXT,
    material_quantity INT,
    material_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    component_material_id INT,
    component_qty INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  component_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  material_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES eco_friendly_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES materials(material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders(
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES eco_friendly_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE shipments(
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    shipment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(order_id)
);
